name: 鄭瑞清
objective:
The purpose of this course is to give graduate students the fundamental knowledge of EM simulation such that they can effectively use commercial EM simulation software to design antennas and microwave circuits. The content includes:
1. A Review Electromagntic
2. Introduction to Electromagnetic Theories
3. Antennas
4. Method of Moments
5. FDTD
7. Finite Element Method
8. IE3D
9. HFSS.
